column1: Events that occurred on .
==On Earth==
* 1934 - J.R.R. Tolkiens poem Firiel (poem) is published within The Chronicle of the Convents of the Sacred Heart (Volume IV).
* 1967 - The Scotsman publishes an interview of J.R.R. Tolkien by William Foster.
* 1968 - Actor Michael Reisz is born.
* 1979 - Actor Lee Pace is born.
* 1986 - The Swiss Tolkien Societies Eredain is founded.
* Since 2003 - Tolkien Reading Day.
* 2014 - Anglo-Saxon Community in J.R.R. Tolkiens the Lord of the Rings is published.
* 2015 - Tolkien Estate launches a new version of the website tolkienestate.com
==In Arda==
** Borondir reaches the Éothéod and delivers them the message of Cirion
** The Host of the West is surrounded by enemies on the Slag-hills.
** Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee reach the Cracks of Doom. Gollum seizes the The One Ring and falls in the Cracks of Doom.
** Downfall of Barad-dûr and passing of Sauron.
** Beginning of the New Year in Gondor.
** Beginning of the Fourth Age in the reckoning of Gondor.
** Elanor Gardner
==Inspiration==

J.R.R. Tolkien noted in Guide to the Names in The Lord of the Rings that the date the Ring was destroyed was purposefully chosen. It coincides with the feast of Wikipedia:Annunciation or Wikipedia:Lady Day.
